00159   void SetUpMahajanParameters(Real **constants,  int pos) {
00160     Real *Constants = new Real[25];
00161     // Define Constants. RCONSTS is Other code
00162     Constants[0] = 136.0; //xnao    
00163     Constants[1] = 140.0; //xki
00164     Constants[2] = 5.4;   //xko
00165     Constants[3] = 1.8;   //cao
00166     Constants[4] = 182.0; // 1000.; //182.0; //gca
00167     Constants[5] = 1.0;   //ica_factor
00168     Constants[6] = 0.04; //0.094; //0.11;  //gtos
00169     // gtof [7]  and gks [10] depends on pos
00170     switch (pos) {
00171   
00172    
00173     case 2:           { Constants[7] = 0.11;  Constants[10] = 0.32;   break;}   
00174     case 1:           { Constants[7] = 0.11;  Constants[10] = 0.48;   break; } 
00175     case 0:           { Constants[7] = 0.11;  Constants[10] = 0.64;   break; }
00176     case 5:  { Constants[7] = 0.055; Constants[10] = 0.2176;  break; }
00177     case 4: { Constants[7] = 0.055; Constants[10] = 0.288;  break; }
00178     case 3: { Constants[7] = 0.055; Constants[10] = 0.384; break; }
00179     case 8: { Constants[7] = 0.055; Constants[10] = 0.256;  break; }
00180     case 7: { Constants[7] = 0.055; Constants[10] = 0.32;   break; }
00181     case 6: { Constants[7] = 0.055; Constants[10] = 0.432;  break; }
00182     default: 
00183       {
00184     std::cout << "Tissue Type not set correctly. Setting to Epi-Apex\n";
00185     Constants[7] = 0.11;  Constants[10] = 0.32; 
00186       }
00187     }
00188     Constants[8] = 0.84;  //gnaca
00189     Constants[9] = 0.0125; //0.27; // 0.01875; // 0.0125;//gkr
00190     Constants[11] = 0.3;  //gk1
00191     Constants[12] = 1.5;  //gnak
00192     Constants[13] = 0.4;  //vup
00193     Constants[14] = 4.0;  //taus
00194     Constants[15] = 12.0; //gna
00195     Constants[16] = 30.0; //taur
00196     Constants[17] = 100.; //taua
00197     Constants[18] = 11.3; //av
00198     Constants[19] = 90.0; //cstar
00199     Constants[20] = 308.; //T
00200     Constants[21] = -80.; //Vc
00201     Constants[22] = 8.314;//xxr
00202     Constants[23] =96.485;//xf
00203     Constants[24] = Constants[23]/(Constants[22]*Constants[20]); //frt
00204 
00205     *constants = Constants;
00206   }
00207 }
